title: Low elo mid champ to carry with
body: So im finding my self to want to come back and start playing league of legends more frequently i was plat in season 3 and gold in season 4(only played placement games) how ever i have found my self to be stuck in silver 1 cant seem to carry im sure part of it is my own decision making etc. to get to the point what champion would you guys say would be the best to carry low elo games from mid with. I tried TF for a bit found some decent results but i dont like the fact how he can be bullied in lane by certain mids.
